__e: Isn't it good? You can get 5000 Yen a month.
I know it's not the right life for me, but how else could I give you 20,000 yen a month?
I have to pay one million yen every month, right?
Your family's total comes to 600,000 yen!
Fifty sen to a boy his age is like ten ryo to us.
With the 1.5 million yen from my life insurance, construct a tomb for me and my husband.
You customers if you pay another 3000 yen you can do what you like with this woman.
I can get my hands on 1,500,000 yen readily enough but we'll have to see about the remaining million
